metadata.description: The Great Emancipator, Time Lincoln, faces an all-new threat to existence -- from within his homeland!  Just when he thought it was safe to go back in time, he discovers part of reality has been replaced by Alternate Reality, where what was once fact is now a matter of alternate choice.  Now he must defeat the mastermind, Emojin Trump, before he blows... the cosmic budget on a wall to keep his Alt-Reality safe!
metadata.name: Trump vs. Time Lincoln
